name: Fleeting Iris
description:
About the Game

Ayame is a beautiful young girl from Ryuugai (Japan) that is living a carefree life in search of happiness. One fateful day, she met Robert, a CIA agent who was in Ryuugai during a mission. They become engaged and she moves to Heaven City (USA) with him.
When she arrives in Heaven City, she realizes she needs to do her best for the relationship to work. You decide the fate of Ayame in this Slice of Life RPG by Heaven Studios making their Steam debut, and Kagura Games' first Western published game

Features:

A Slice of Life RPG
Dynamic Storytelling
Contemporary Setting
Make Your Own Decisions
Fast Travel
